author: rooneg
msg: Add another "do this in Java-land because I don't understand why it
won't work in C++" hack, this time to let us cast a Searcher to an
IndexSearcher, so we can call close on it.
(main): add some code to exercise the search code.

author: jm
msg: more minor spamc cleanups; convert C++-style comments to C-style comments because we still need to compile on platforms that don't support those; also, don't compare floats using ==, it doesn't always work

author: chathura
msg: Change the ComponentFactory to be inline with the Interface change

author: mmarinschek
msg: Empty strings ought not to be converted to null values.
